text:
e="preserve">Murray Olderman (March 27, 1922 – June 10, 2020) was an American sports cartoonist and writer. His art was used by the Pro Football Hall of Fame and hung above the Hall of Fame statues. The Hall of Fame made all of the artwork digital so that visitors to the hall can see them through electronic kiosks. He was born in New York City.
Olderman died on June 10, 2020 in Rancho Mirage, California from a heart attack, aged 98.
